values.text: Hey I am spyro "the customer care chat bot" here to answer your questions related to METRO stores what should I call you ?

For any appointments or communication  you can use the following contact details
Email:"wecare@metro.co.in"
Number:"tel:1860-266-2010"(valid from 9am - 9pm)
oh the store timings are given in the following link please use the link METRO store timings
